body: Page 4 Lancer ga shinda!

There's also one in which the author had Gudao fucked both Jalter AND Salter. Granted in the end he still goes for Jalter. Hell, he even made one dedicated to Salter herself. I think the author really likes the Alters.

@ricefricker Exactly my dude. No fgo player would ever NTR a waifu they went through all the trouble of NP5ing. Also he kind of already did NTR with the fireworks scene in one of the previous Jalter doujins of his. Was barely NTR so I think we're in the clear. I think the last lines in this one that Jalter said were just the author confirming it's a romantic relationship in his doujins of her. And that's not common but I very much appreciate it. Makes it much more enjoyable.
